message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I know you'll find it incredibly valuable. I'm asking for $11,500.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is below my minimum. Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe $10,000 is the maximum I can pay. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
